[[Deidara]] creates a [[Explosive Clay|clay]] [[Explosive Clay: Owl|owl]] and [[Explosive Clay: Phoenix|eagle]], that explodes on impact with an opponent. 

== Trivia ==
* In the anime and manga, a similar method to this was used, but instead of that, Deidara uses two eagles to perform the technique.

[[es:Arcilla Explosiva: Dos Pájaros]]
[[pl:Kibaku Nendo: Sōchō]]
